reviews.review_text: Their menu is interesting and they have a few items that are out there. But I ordered the Toranj special fries, the Bandari sausage and Royal burger. All were a little different but delicious. Service is decent and there is some seating inside but not a very large restaurant. No real parking, although there is a paid lot behind the building on Richards. Give it a try. Parking: Paid kit located behind the building on Richards

I recently dined at this new restaurant that offers a delightful fusion of classic sandwiches and burgers with a Persian twist. The standout dish for me was the Toranj burger, which instantly transported me back to the flavors of home. The restaurant itself had a welcoming ambiance, and the staff were friendly and attentive. If you re looking for a unique twist on traditional sandwiches and burgers, I highly recommend giving this restaurant a try.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re thrilled to hear that you found our food delicious.

reviews.review_text: I had my dinner with my colleagues after our workshop earlier today. I ordered the beef and chicken kebab combination and veggie soup. It was delicious and quite different. Two waitresses recommended us to try out the cheese burger or Toranj special fries.

My wife and I visited Vancouver and came to this place for lunch. The place is clean, well maintained and the staff is very friendly. We loved the taste of food / meat at this restaurant. Anyone looking for tasty Persian style burgers should definitely give this place a try. Worth a trip!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the five start review.

reviews.review_text: Truly amazing Persian food!! Was totally impressed by the quality and portion of the cheeseburger and sandwiches (ended up bringing some home), along with the friendly staff. What I like most is the passion of the chef - he cooks from the heart. Will definitely recommend family and friends!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the five start review.

reviews.review_text: It was my first experience to have food in Persian fast food around my workplace. It was like a nostalgic place with tables around the dining space. The staff was friendly. The menu is almost complete but it could be better with serving some more nostalgic food, such as Zapata   I tasted the classic burger and fries. So delicious. I recommend it strongly. Hope they become one of the high-ranked in Vancouver.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Its fantastic to hear about your experience! Your feedback on adding more nostalgic food options is valuable, and well definitely consider it. We look forward to your next visit.

reviews.review_text: Great Persian style sandwiches and very friendly! Would definitely go again and highly recommend the place.

My recent visit to was an exceptional experience marked by friendly and attentive staff, exquisite cuisine, and a charming atmosphere. The combination of warm hospitality and delicious food made it a memorable dining experience, and I highly recommend it to others.

Friendly manager and a helpful staff greeted us warmly. The chef personally delivered a sample of our chosen dishes, assuring us of their exceptional quality. Our meal featured a delectable roast beef sandwich paired with Toranjs special fries. The Persian-style sandwiches were an absolute delight, bursting with a generous array of ingredients. We thoroughly enjoyed our dining experience!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re delighted that you enjoyed the food and look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: I visited Toranj for the first time today, and I was pleased with the quality of the food, big portion, and friendly environment.  I am glad to find this place. I do recommend them 100%
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We can t wait to welcome you back soon. Your support means a lot to us!

reviews.review_text: I recently had the pleasure of trying the sandwich at Toranj Food, and I can confidently say it was a culinary masterpiece. From the very first bite, I was captivated by the incredible blend of flavors and textures. The fresh, high-quality ingredients used in this sandwich truly shine, making it a delectable treat for the taste buds. What sets Toranj Food apart is their commitment to excellence in every aspect of their cuisine, and its evident in the perfection of this sandwich. I cant wait to savor it again soon! Vegetarian options: Beyond burger
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re delighted that you enjoyed the food and look forward to serving you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Tonight, I tried this place for the first time, and it was fantastic. It matched my expectations, just like my previous visit to Tehranvila in Tehran. I highly recommend giving it a try.

If you want a genuine taste of Iranian style sandwiches, this is THE place for you. Very well cooked and balanced, right portion sizes, and a nostalgic taste. Highly recommended. They also have Delester. Food : 5/5

Today was my first time at Torang. I was so happy with the food quality. On top of the amazing customer service, I had the best burger in town here in the Resturant. I wish they had another location in North Vancouver too.

The food was amazing; the quality and quantity were both excellent. I ordered the Roast beef, which was delicious, especially for Persian tastes. This restaurant has a nostalgic flavor with its excellent dressing in the sandwiches. However, be cautious: the bandari is exceptionally tasty but spicy!

Enjoyed the type of food that I was missing for a long time, with exceptional quality and in a very nice environment. The management is nice, polite, knowledgeable, and friendly. Would highly recommend
One of the best persian food I ve ever had
Every thing is good I really enjoyed the food, and the staffs behavior in the restaurant was excellent. Ill definitely come back and place an order again. Food
Beef Kebab is so good and juicy, perfect with rice. We also love the grilled tomato. Great portion too.

Dietary restrictions: The food is not only healthy but it is mostly cooked & specially supervised by the owner.  Having been few times tasting different dishes I discovered that the owner intention is to a serve the guests not as customers.  That is why the food is not only tasty but surely safe and in my opinion without exaggeration. You will thank me when you experience yourself.

reviews.review_text: The food quality is good.  A bit pricey compared to the other competitions. It would be best if they improved the overall customer service. Food : 5/5

I went to Toranjfood restaurant today, resturant was small but charming. Since I had experienced Toranj Tehran before, I ordered their special Toranj burger. The burger was very delicious and served with a side of Lettuce salad. The taste of the food was delightful to the point that it didn t need any sauce or extra additions. The Volume of cheese used in the burger was appropriate and the price of burger was a bit expensive. There were also some large french fries on the side, which were good. It was served in a stainless steel dish, which I didn t like very much, but it s definitely better than a plastic container in my opinion. Overall, the food was good, and the restaurant s location on Rabson Street was convenient and accessible. The staff and the restaurant s master chef were excellent.

Good vibes, nice seats and great subs. We liked the taste and quality of their food but I really prefer cheesy juicy sandwiches stuffed with meat and specially veggies. Also, itd be more appetizing and mouthwatering if they used better ventilation to get rid of the unpleasant odor or better yet made it smell like a good barbeque party would! Its just a few short steps away from becoming a 5-star persian cuisine!
My parents went there for lunch yesterday and we went back for dinner the same night. If this is not a great compliment, what is? The food was just delicious. I highly recommend the sandwiches.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the review. We value your feedback and hope to serve you soon.

reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the food there, its delicious.

The Bandari sandwich was poor. The bread was low quality, the grease was not drained rendering it very soggy (see pic)...to a point that I didnt finish, and for a price point of $14.99 it was a super let down. Obviously for a sandwich which has a saucy base, youd pick a different bun than the others that strictly are served with only meats and veggies. A crispier and slightly robust bread would not only survive the gravy but welcome it with its crunch.....magnifying the texture and taste. The Brain & Tongue sandwich. Ok....so this meal is described as a mixture of both meats. There was barely any brain and mostly tongue and even that was scarce. Brain meat is much more expensive than tongue and for the price of a whopping $20.99 per sandwich it is way out of left field. The first thing you notice when you walk in are the high prices for what really is fast food. Sadly, the food didnt justify the digits. This corner is extremely tough with so many options, variety and incredible foods. Toranj I hope you strive to do better in the future. Best of Luck.
I was excited to try this Persian restaurant. We got takeout brain and tongue sandwich. SOOOO little ingredients, and so much bread. Especially for $22, I m disappointed
A fast-food restaurant which offers super expensive food. The portion was fine but considering the prices and quality, definitely not worth it!

It was my first time here and I will never be in there. I came there alone to have lunch and the restaurant was completely empty and at the time I was there just three more customers were there. However the person at the counter asked me to sit in the worst place in the restaurant because I was alone that table had very uncomfortable seats and when I refused to do so she gave a place close to the door. It was a cold windy day and I was very uncomfortable. Two men came after me and sat whenever they liked. The kebab didn t taste good. I gave you two star only because the staff apologized, but remember whenever a women comes to your restaurant alone sit her in the best place possible. I m so sorry I stepped into this place which gave me an awful feeling and experience.
We ordered roast beef and cheese burger The taste of the meat was not good Roast beef was so oily There is a bad smell inside the restaurant also
Got a chicken schnitzel sandwich and it was legitimately super tasty, but the whole restaurant smelt of sick fecal matter. If i got too far from tasty sandwich smell i was halfway to throwing up.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We value your feedback and delighted that you enjoyed the chicken sandwich. We ve also noticed the smell today and activity investigating the origin to resolve the issue. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

reviews.review_text: Small food portion, greasy and way too overpriced. The kabob sandwich s meat was mainly filled with filler rather than meat.
Super dissapointed. The roll kebab is not rolled  and the meat was not well done. Way too expensive for this. Food
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re truly sorry to hear about your recent experience. We value your feedback and undoubtedly will be taken into consideration as we continuously evaluate and improve our services. We look forward to welcoming you back and exceeding your expectations in the future.

reviews.review_text: Ordered a roll kebab that was supposed to be served on a flatbread. However, the dish I received arrived with a regular (hot dog?!) bun, and the serving portion was very small
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We re truly sorry to hear about your recent experience. Our goal is to provide a delightful dining experience for all our guests, and we appreciate your feedback. We hope you will consider visiting us again as we would love to showcase our commitment to quality.

reviews.review_text: I was very excited for the food, but unfortunately the quality was awful and the meat was completely stale.
Very over priced burger, the quality of the burger is not that great, they have a friendly service though. I won t come back.
Horrible food

I visited Toranj Food on November 25th, excited to try their unique lamb brain and beef tongue sandwich. The price seemed reasonable at $21.99 before tax, and I willingly added a 15% tip. However, my experience quickly turned sour. Initially, I requested the sandwich to be cut in half, a simple ask that was overlooked. The wait for my order was unexpectedly long, and it was disheartening to see others who arrived later receive their food first. When I inquired about the delay, the response from the staff was dismissive, attributing the delay to the kitchen without any apology. The sandwich, when it finally arrived, was not cut in half as requested. The explanation that it was cut from inside was baffling, especially since it was wrapped in paper. It took further insistence to have it properly cut. The biggest letdown was the sandwich itself. Halfway through, I discovered an absence of the promised lamb brain, with only faint traces of it for flavor. This was not what I expected, especially for the price. Adding to my frustration, a review of Google reviews revealed that this issue with the sandwich lacking lamb brain is not uncommon among customers. This consistent problem suggests a pattern of misleading menu descriptions. Based on this experience, I cannot recommend Toranj Food. The service was lacking, and the food did not live up to its description. Disappointed, I doubt Ill return or try other menu items.
